feed.title: OliveTin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.10.14
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 97378868398692337c6124b3f4ecb88edab6a6af feature: Better websocket error message (#417)
  • 706441799ff3158ecbc8627d9697ee6d4f5d6500 feature: Custom navigation links in the nav (sidebar/topbar)
  • b31cdf15a20c29f6301f02a3ba4ef97b9d99e48c feature: Email argument type (#433)
  • 5d82ae7680bdbefe0604072d206e989373f22bc8 feature: Log username with each request #422 (#424)
  • 3b8976fd5105a11aa28be369d36141ed54eeca1e feature: Login screen
  • fb7e6502675c79ffd3e4b97e9026f86321adc9c2 feature: OAuth2 Redirect URL
  • 6a7187fb5b6a7fa900d7df0f0da8fdb3ebf02734 feature: OAuth2! :-D
  • a187c8c8a0e56ea0617e7ee4a3298bd5bf5e59de feature: Slightly nicer looking logs and diagnostics pages (#427)
  • 411f1bff1c1e8aa185a2fe5b9a69867b34a32315 feature: Style the currently selected section in nav, and few minor style improvements (#429)
  • 00856f15a7dd3c5dd0fe6318612fa8d2b3ae170c feature: pass ot_ args to shellAfterCompleted (#420)

Bug fixes

  • eee4c4e4048845071824656fd2e9c4a4466a368e bugfix: Auth in the wrong place (#430)
  • 6c289506c2dbef1c277c953f7e917064d444994f bugfix: Fixed unusual issues that slipped through with shellAfterCompleted (#425)

Others

  • 35dca508632567be8646269e21c2d300313953f7 Make it possible to redirect to a login url unless authenticated (#347)
  • 86e876a9c9fac9ba29e365e14eb3368254cddee9 Merge branch 'main' of ssh://github.com/OliveTin/OliveTin
  • d1c67a9dd84d5e0882b7928a0d6c1ec1ca9a13e4 depbump: js micromatch 4.0.8 (#426)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.10.14

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.10.14

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.10.17
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 1af2e921323ee0ba3bf3d922c8861652d3913222 feature: Local user login!
  • 71ad5d2e3a14fae7755b2e856981f50887745558 feature: local auth! (#441)
  • de81ec00fd138693a33e62a91e71924a4eaac73a feature: mix of bits (#439)

Bug fixes

  • 32b5fee108b0662b771d8eaf74e79a5c0ff85760 bugfix: Fixed crash when requesting execution status that could not be found (NPE) (#440)
  • 7cc07158ab798a3baf4afd93476cf469b9dce10f bugfix: Turns out this should now be 403 instead (#438)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.10.17

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.10.17

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.10.26
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 16b07283b0a48593b040fc2d3d8352e4fa6c40b9 feature: Add riscv build! (#453)
  • 80e5b5b0c1bd8ba1463d72967052996978f60f75 feature: Cleanup auth code (#444)
  • be5ddda0207212be336a618535488cede9333085 feature: freebsd support (#454)

Bug fixes

  • be9b2a7c7814847cc5b1abec68794631a8ce2f07 bugfix: Cookie expiry for OAuth2 & Local set to 1 year, not session (#451)
  • d7814ff6df876b9fbf289d0b069976a7343ca849 bugfix: If a button is disabled in the API, render it disabled [skip ci]

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.10.26

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.10.26

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.10.27
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • 91171633169dc1c897306121bb5382ba4fb3f172 bugfix: Login form was not displayed if only OAuth2 was configured (#457)
  • d3ad811ac5d971e76a5d9b836c4ecb3d4a00a96e bugfix: Removed hardcoded dependency on GitHub in OAuth2 flow (#458)

Others

  • ee26fe6b50114e490b8f0db71aaca14d1ce040ef ci github int tests settle (#459)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.10.27
